content:
User: Craft the Prompt: Each API call will include the chunk and specific tagging instructions (e.g., “Tag this transcript chunk for #IDEA_BIG, #BREAKOUT_EVENT, etc.”).

Grok: Handle Batch Processing: Since the API has a 128K character limit, we’ll process chunks in batches (e.g., 80K-100K characters each), as Grok suggested.
